ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of HUGUETTE LABELLE, C.C., O.Ont., of Ottawa, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as the Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective July 19, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of HUGUETTE LABELLE, C.C., O.Ont., of Ottawa, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as the Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective July 19, 2018.
